snippet: Federal health officials say that the two cases are not related although both involve health care providers working in Saudi Arabia.
abstract: Federal and state health officials say a second case of MERS, Middle East respiratory Virus circulating on the Arabian peninsula, has been found in the United States.
lead_paragraph: Federal health officials say that the two cases are not related although both involve health care providers working in Saudi Arabia.

headline.main: Second U.S. Case of MERS Virus Is Confirmed
headline.print_headline: 2nd U.S. Case of MERS Virus Is Confirmed

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
